name: A Selfish Child
description:
twitter | facebook | website | press contact | more games

Create a loop that contain every similar shape to win.

A game by Nikolay Todorov and Colin Thil

Made for the Stop Motion Game Jam 2018

Features seven generated puzzles

Controls:

  • Mouse
  • Arrow keys
  • Enter

Concept : Nikolay Todorov and Colin Thil

Text, visuals : Nikolay Todorov

Design, programming : Colin Thil

Sounds made with Bfxr (Increpare)

Made using P5.js
